entries.title: Boy found buried under Arkansas house; mother, man arrested
entries.description: The body of a 6-year-old boy was found buried under the floor of a house.

entries.title: Famed Los Angeles mountain lion euthanized
entries.description: Los Angeles’ famed mountain lion P-22, that roamed Griffith Park, has been euthanized.

entries.title: Oppenheimer wrongly stripped of security clearance, US says
entries.description: The Biden administration has reversed a decades-old decision to revoke the security clearance of Robert Oppenheimer, the physicist called the father of the atomic bomb for his leading role in World War II’s Manhattan Project

entries.title: Millions of Americans have long COVID. Here's how you can support them.
entries.description: Long COVID patients, doctors and disability experts offer advice on how to best support patients with the debilitating condition.

entries.title: Iran authorities arrest actress of Oscar-winning movie
entries.description: Taraneh Alidoosti faces charges of spreading falsehoods about protests.

entries.title: Frustrated virtual reality pioneer leaves Facebook's parent
entries.description: A prominent video game creator who helped lead Facebook’s expansion into virtual reality has resigned from the social networking service’s corporate parent after becoming disillusioned with the way the technology is being managed

entries.title: Probation for ex-teacher in NY who gave teen vaccine dose
entries.description: A former Long Island high school teacher accused of injecting a teen with a COVID-19 vaccine at her home without his parents’ knowledge has been sentenced to community service and probation

entries.title: 5 in critical condition following Memphis shooting
entries.description: Five people are in critical condition following a shooting in Memphis, Tennessee.

entries.title: Mexican army says Jalisco drug cartel kidnapped colonel
entries.description: The Mexican army says the violent Jalisco drug cartel has kidnapped a colonel who commanded a detachment in the gang-dominated northern border city of Nuevo Laredo, across from Laredo, Texas

entries.title: Title 42 reversal will lead to migrant surge: DHS
entries.description: The Department of Homeland Security expects an increase in migration with the rollback of Title 42.

entries.title: Woman injured in London concert crowd crush dies in hospital
entries.description: Police say a woman injured in a crush outside a London concert venue has died

entries.title: Anti-LGBTQ hate thrives online, spurs fears of more violence
entries.description: Hate speech and threats of violence targeting transgender people and other LGBTQ individuals is thriving on social media and spurring fears of more violence

entries.title: Crypto's ties to sports raise ethical questions
entries.description: Sports fans who view their favorite players as role models might think twice before taking their financial advice, too

entries.title: Poland's top cop set off grenade launcher by accident
entries.description: The grenade launcher was a gift from Ukrainian officials.

entries.title: Thailand's king, queen test positive for COVID-19
entries.description: Thailand’s king and queen have tested positive for COVID-19, and so far have only mild symptoms

entries.title: Moldova suspends 6 TV channels over alleged misinformation
entries.description: Authorities in Moldova say six television channels in the eastern European country have had their broadcast licenses suspended over accusations of misinformation, inaccurate coverage of Russia’s war in Ukraine and “attempts to manipulate public opinion.”

entries.title: Tunisians vote for parliament amid economic, democracy vows
entries.description: Tunisians are voting for a new parliament to the backdrop of a dire economic crisis and concerns of democracy backsliding in the North African country — the cradle of Arab Spring protests a decade ago

entries.title: WATCH:  Colorado mountain lions visit family's backyard
entries.description: Two mountain lions visited a Colorado home’s backyard, with one curiously sniffing around the security camera that spotted them.

entries.title: Reno mayor sues after finding tracking device on vehicle
entries.description: Reno's mayor is suing a private investigator and his company after finding a tracking device attached to her vehicle that was capable of tracking its real-time location

entries.title: Washington man gets 2 years for threatening Black shoppers
entries.description: A suburban Seattle man has been sentenced to two years in federal prison for threatening to shoot Black customers at grocery stores in Buffalo, New York, and at businesses in other states

entries.title: Pentagon says no alien life on Earth yet: 'The answer's no'
entries.description: In its review of hundreds of UFO incidents, Pentagon officials say they have not seen evidence so far that any are from extraterrestrials.

entries.title: US tourist caught with animal bones after flying back from Africa: CBP
entries.description: A Virginia woman tried to bring a bag of giraffe and zebra bones through a Washington, D.C.-area airport last month upon arriving on a flight from Kenya.

entries.title: Court denies GOP states' effort to continue Title 42 border expulsions pending appeal
entries.description: A federal appeals court on denied an effort by several Republican-led states to continue a Trump-era public health order to expel migrants immediately at the border.

entries.title: 2 dead, 2 injured in shooting outside Chicago high school
entries.description: Four people were shot, two fatally, outside Benito Juarez High School Friday afternoon, police said.

entries.title: TSA recovers record number of firearms at checkpoints in 2022
entries.description: TSA said it has recovered a record 6,301 firearms from airport security checkpoints so far this year as of Friday -- more than 88% of which were loaded.
